topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/556aa34d6368726d73202400#post_556aa34d6368726d73202400
One thing that I felt that Digimon anime was always better at was story arcs. It's not like Pokemon where 90% of the episodes of the seasons are mundane episodic "life problems" and characters, subjects that they likely will never revisit again with no relevance to the story.

topics.body:
"@And Brother I Hurt People":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/556aa4656368720b234a2100#post_556aa4656368720b234a2100
That was a Lupe.
There was also this species of dog with antenna ears. If I recall, they're called _Glert_.
Kiko are weird floating ball things with arms. I like Aisha, that cat with long antenna like ears. Never got to get a Draik.
Never get a Skeith! Skeiths are those fat looking dragons with narrow eyes and small wings. You could feed them *anything*. But if you leave them unattended and hungry, they'll automatically pick items randomly from your inventory and you will find some items missing. Always store your valuables in the safety deposit if you have a Skeith or a Grawl(those t-rex things).
